mapper.insert: insert into tbl_requirement_feature_time_trace (REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID, REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_CREATE_TIME, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE,LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{requirementFeatureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{requirementFeatureCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update tbl_requirement_feature_time_trace
REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID = #{requirementFeatureId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_CREATE_TIME = #{requirementFeatureCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEV_TASK_CREATE_TIME = #{devTaskCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CODE_FIRST_COMMIT_TIME = #{codeFirstCommitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_DEV_COMPLETE_TIME = #{requirementFeatureDevCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_FIRST_TEST_DEPLOY_TIME = #{requirementFeatureFirstTestDeployTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TESTING_TIME = #{requirementFeatureTestingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TEST_COMPLETE_TIME = #{requirementFeatureTestCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_LAST_PROD_TIME = #{requirementFeatureLastProdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_PROD_COMPLETE_TIME = #{requirementFeatureProdCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_requirement_feature_time_trace set REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID = #{requirementFeatureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_CREATE_TIME = #{requirementFeatureCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEV_TASK_CREATE_TIME = #{devTaskCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CODE_FIRST_COMMIT_TIME = #{codeFirstCommitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_DEV_COMPLETE_TIME = #{requirementFeatureDevCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_FIRST_TEST_DEPLOY_TIME = #{requirementFeatureFirstTestDeployTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TESTING_TIME = #{requirementFeatureTestingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TEST_COMPLETE_TIME = #{requirementFeatureTestCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_LAST_PROD_TIME = #{requirementFeatureLastProdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_PROD_COMPLETE_TIME = #{requirementFeatureProdCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.`click_date` as cliskDate, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_PROD_COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= t1.click_date AND t1.click_date <= now() THEN 1 else null END) as 'onLine', count(case when DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TEST_COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= t1.click_date AND t1.click_date < DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_PROD_COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 else null END) as 'stayOnline', count(case when DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TESTING_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= t1.click_date AND t1.click_date < DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TEST_COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 else null END) as 'inVerification', count(case when DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_FIRST_TEST_DEPLOY_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= t1.click_date AND t1.click_date < DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TESTING_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 else null END) as 'waitValid', count(case when DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_DEV_COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= t1.click_date AND t1.click_date < DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_FIRST_TEST_DEPLOY_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 else null END) as 'achieve', count(case when DATE_FORMAT(trftt.CODE_FIRST_COMMIT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= t1.click_date AND t1.click_date < DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_DEV_COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 else null END) as 'process', count(case when DATE_FORMAT(trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= t1.click_date AND t1.click_date < DATE_FORMAT(trftt.CODE_FIRST_COMMIT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 else null END) as 'ready' FROM (
SELECT @s :=@s + 1 as `index`, DATE(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL @s DAY)) AS `click_date` FROM mysql.help_topic,(SELECT @s := -1) temp WHERE @s < #{day} ) t1 join tbl_requirement_feature_time_trace trftt LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature trf ON trftt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID=trf.ID AND trf.`STATUS`=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON trf.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.`STATUS`=1 WHERE trftt.`STATUS`=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY t1.`click_date` ORDER BY t1.`click_date` ASC

SELECT t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_CREATE_TIME,t1.CODE_FIRST_COMMIT_TIME, t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_DEV_COMPLETE_TIME,t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_FIRST_TEST_DEPLOY_TIME, t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TESTING_TIME,t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_TEST_COMPLETE_TIME, t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_PROD_COMPLETE_TIME FROM tbl_requirement_feature_time_trace t1 LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature trf ON t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID=trf.ID AND trf.`STATUS` = 1 LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON trf.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.`STATUS` = 1 WHERE t1.`STATUS`=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and trf.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_STATUS !='00'

SELECT t1.ID,t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID,t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_CREATE_TIME, t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_PROD_COMPLETE_TIME FROM tbl_requirement_feature_time_trace t1 LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature trf ON t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID=trf.ID AND trf.`STATUS` = 1 LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON trf.SYSTEM_ID=tsi.ID AND tsi.`STATUS` = 1 WHERE t1.`STATUS`=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND trf.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_STATUS !='00' AND t1.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_PROD_COMPLETE_TIME is not null
